addon:addon.name: Shelly Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding integrates Shelly devices that can be controlled via Wi-Fi.

parameter.name: defaultUserId
parameter.label: Default UserId
parameter.description: This default user id will be used for device access if no one is specified in the thing configuration.

parameter.name: defaultPassword
parameter.label: Default Password
parameter.description: Default password for device access if none is specified in the thing configuration.

parameter.name: localIP
parameter.label: Host Interface IP
parameter.description: This interface will be used to setup CoIoT listen and build Action URLs. openHAB's network configuration will be used if this is not set (recommended)

parameter.name: autoCoIoT
parameter.label: Auto-CoIoT
parameter.description: If enabled CoIoT will be automatically used when the devices runs a firmware version 1.6 or newer; false: Use thing configuration to enabled/disable CoIoT events.
